sentences.sentence: He has a number of social engagements next week.
sentences.translation: 他下周有几次社交约会。

sentences.sentence: He has a number of speaking engagements this week.
sentences.translation: 他这个星期安排了几次演讲。

sentences.sentence: He had to cancel some engagements because of tiredness.
sentences.translation: 他由于疲劳不得不取消一些约会。
